mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expense(rdate, categoryno, expenseitem, expensemoney, mno) VALUES (#{rdate}, #{categoryno}, #{expenseitem}, #{expensemoney}, #{mno})
mapper.select: SELECT c.categoryno, c.categorysort, p.expenseno, p.rdate, p.categoryno, p.expenseitem, p.expensemoney, p.mno FROM category c, expense p WHERE c.categoryno = p.categoryno ORDER BY rdate DESC
SELECT expenseno, SUBSTRING(rdate, 1, 7) as rdate, categoryno, expenseitem, expensemoney, mno FROM expense WHERE SUBSTRING(rdate, 1, 7) = #{month} ORDER BY rdate DESC
